children.value: Made during a hack week at work. This is a proof of concept of a 3D faceted search UI allowing filtering and partitioning over 50,000 data points at 60 FPS in the browser. Uses react, threejs and react-three-fiber.

frontmatter.title: 3D Faceted Search
frontmatter.description: A proof of concept of a 3D faceted search UI for the browser
